General.Name: Shenzhen Prince New Materials Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Prince New Materials Co.,Ltd. produces and sells packaging materials in China. The company offers plastic products, including compound and ordinary plastic bags, packing films, blister tray products, medicine packing, and bearing band products; and environmentally friendly materials, energy project, electronic and internet products packaging materials, semiconductor peripheral packaging products, and visual packaging materials. It also provides food and medicine printing, thin honeycomb paper, EPS, EPO, carton, molded pulp, and plastic tray packaging materials. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
